title: How can Rams defeat Brady? Can Packers defense stop 49ers? Michael Buffer; CJ Uzomah; AJ Hawk; Ryan Leaf
itunes:title: How can Rams defeat Brady? Can Packers defense stop 49ers? Michael Buffer; CJ Uzomah; AJ Hawk; Ryan Leaf
description:
In the latest edition of the Good Morning Football Podcast, hosts Kay Adams, Kyle Brandt, Peter Schrager, and Super Bowl Champion Michael Robinson explore how the Los Angeles Rams can defeat the seven-time Super Bowl Champion Tom Brady in Tampa. Then they're joined by the legendary Michael Buffer and he shares where: 'Let's Get Ready to Rumble' came from and why Najee Harris is his favorite angry runner; they're joined by CJ Uzomah and he talks about his first playoff win, the Ickey Shuffle, and how they're preparing for the Titans; they're joined by AJ Hawk and he shares his thoughts on the Packers - 49ers matchup and why Aaron Rodgers deserves the MVP; and lastly, they're joined by Ryan Leaf and he shares his thoughts on why he has his eyes on Joe Burrow and the Bengals this weekend and why Matthew Stafford has the most pressure on him this weekend.

The Good Morning Football Podcast is part of the NFL Podcast Network.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
